A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a really good film on it's own but a terrible Star Wars film and that's what really matters to the fans. The story was badly written and failed to address really important points which are linked to Star Wars lore. I don't think Rian Johnson is a true fan and it shows in his mishandling of this film. Help us JJ Abrams\, you're our only hope.
